entry.title: Bear Classification: From Data Collection to GUI for Model Inference

link.title: Bear Classification: From Data Collection to GUI for Model Inference

entry.summary: In this notebook, we are going to understand the concepts and codes discussed in Lesson 2 of fast.ai book and it's Deep Learning Part-1 2020 course. We will be classifying bear into 3 categories: grizzly, black and teddy bears.
